snippet.title: Haunt - Gameplay Launch Trailer (XBLA Kinect)
snippet.description:
The cartoon-spooky Kinect game Haunt released on Xbox Live Arcade on January 18, 2012 for $10 (800 MSP).

ABOUT THIS GAME
************************
Haunt, which appears to be a haunted house game, skewing toward cartoony rather than realistic horror.
Haunt is being published by Microsoft Game Studios as one of five Xbox 360 exclusives revealed at the 2010 Tokyo Game Show. It comes from the mind of Masaya Matsuura, the man behind Parappa. If that doesn't push your zany buttons, the lead is being voiced by Double Fine head Tim Schafer, after he impressed the team with his GDC speech.
Haunt is now available on Xbox Live Arcade on January 18, 2012 for $10 (800 MSP)

Haunt
*******
GENRE: Action, Horror
RELEASE DATE(S):
+ (US): January 18, 2012
+ (EU): January 18, 2012
PLATFORM: XBLA Kinect
EXCLUSIVELY ON: XBLA Kinect
WEBSITE: http://www.zoemode.com/
AVAILABLE @ AMAZON: n/a

PUBLISHER: Microsoft Game Studios / Zoe Mode
DEVELOPER: NanaOn-Sha
ESRB: RP for Rating Pending
